Title: The Godfather
StoryLine: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: GoodFellas
StoryLine: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Title: Pulp Fiction
StoryLine: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Usual Suspects
StoryLine: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

Title: Apocalypse Now
StoryLine: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: Trainspotting
StoryLine: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

Title: Fight Club
StoryLine: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Title: Schindler's List
StoryLine: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Boogie Nights
StoryLine: An idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

Title: Reservoir Dogs
StoryLine: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
StoryLine: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

Title: Jaws
StoryLine: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Title: Taxi Driver
StoryLine: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Title: L.A. Confidential
StoryLine: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: Back to the Future
StoryLine: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Title: The Godfather Part II
StoryLine: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: Fargo
StoryLine: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Title: The Dark Knight
StoryLine: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

Title: The Matrix
StoryLine: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Title: Magnolia
StoryLine: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Title: Scarface
StoryLine: Miami in the 1980s: a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Florida, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

Title: The Royal Tenenbaums
StoryLine: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

Title: Donnie Darko
StoryLine: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

Title: Platoon
StoryLine: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Title: Heat
StoryLine: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

Title: American Beauty
StoryLine: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Title: The Big Lebowski
StoryLine: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Title: Raging Bull
StoryLine: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

Title: A Prophet
StoryLine: A delinquent Muslim man struggles to get by in prison until he is taken under the wing of a powerful mob boss. But his gradual rise through the mob's ranks brings him in conflict with his mentor.

Title: The Departed
StoryLine: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: There's Something About Mary
StoryLine: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

Title: Leon
StoryLine: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Title: City of God
StoryLine: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
StoryLine: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
StoryLine: When four small-time criminals lose a rigged poker game against a London kingpin, he gives them one week to settle their enormous debt.

Title: The Truman Show
StoryLine: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

Title: Toy Story
StoryLine: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Title: Alien
StoryLine: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

Title: Rushmore
StoryLine: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

Title: Seven
StoryLine: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: Good Will Hunting
StoryLine: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: Aliens
StoryLine: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Title: The Exorcist
StoryLine: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
StoryLine: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Title: Chinatown
StoryLine: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

Title: Casino
StoryLine: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

Title: True Romance
StoryLine: In Detroit, a pop-culture nerd steals cocaine from his new wife's pimp and tries to sell it in Hollywood, prompting the mobsters who own the drugs to pursue the couple.

Title: Gladiator
StoryLine: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
StoryLine: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

Title: Miller's Crossing
StoryLine: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

Title: Being John Malkovich
StoryLine: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Title: Die Hard
StoryLine: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Title: Casablanca
StoryLine: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Kick-Ass
StoryLine: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

Title: The Prestige
StoryLine: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
StoryLine: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Title: Evil Dead II
StoryLine: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

Title: Jurassic Park
StoryLine: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

Title: Batman Begins
StoryLine: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

Title: The Green Mile
StoryLine: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of a prison, meets an inmate, John Coffey, a black man who is accused of murdering two girls. His life changes drastically when he discovers that John has a special gift.

Title: The French Connection
StoryLine: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Title: Unforgiven
StoryLine: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

Title: Drive
StoryLine: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver.

Title: The Shining
StoryLine: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

Title: The Evil Dead
StoryLine: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

Title: Forrest Gump
StoryLine: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: The Thing
StoryLine: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Title: Citizen Kane
StoryLine: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Title: Blue Velvet
StoryLine: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

Title: The Wicker Man
StoryLine: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
StoryLine: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

Title: The Princess Bride
StoryLine: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
StoryLine: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

Title: Go
StoryLine: The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.

Title: Stand by Me
StoryLine: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
StoryLine: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
StoryLine: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: Toy Story 2
StoryLine: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.
Director: John Lasseter, Ash Brannon, Lee Unkrich

Title: Saving Private Ryan
StoryLine: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
StoryLine: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Title: Sin City
StoryLine: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.
Director: Frank Miller, Quentin Tarantino, Robert Rodriguez

Title: Saw
StoryLine: Two men awaken to find themselves on the opposite sides of a dead body, each with specific instructions to kill the other or face consequences. These two are the latest victims of the Jigsaw Killer.

Title: My Left Foot
StoryLine: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

Title: Bowling for Columbine
StoryLine: Filmmaker Michael Moore explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

Title: Man on Fire
StoryLine: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: Almost Famous
StoryLine: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

Title: High Fidelity
StoryLine: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Title: Django Unchained
StoryLine: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Title: 12 Angry Men
StoryLine: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Title: Memento
StoryLine: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

Title: Rain Man
StoryLine: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.

Title: Minority Report
StoryLine: John works with the PreCrime police which stop crimes before they take place, with the help of three 'PreCogs' who can foresee crimes. Events ensue when John finds himself framed for a future murder.

Title: Goldfinger
StoryLine: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

Title: The Social Network
StoryLine: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: American Psycho
StoryLine: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Men in Black
StoryLine: James, an NYC cop, is hired by Agent K of a secret government agency that monitors extraterrestrial life on Earth. Together, they must recover an item that has been stolen by an intergalactic villain.

Title: No Country for Old Men
StoryLine: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: Airplane!
StoryLine: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.
Director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

Title: There Will Be Blood
StoryLine: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Title: Inception
StoryLine: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: JFK
StoryLine: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Title: King Kong
StoryLine: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

Title: The Terminator
StoryLine: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
StoryLine: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
StoryLine: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
StoryLine: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: The Color of Money
StoryLine: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Title: This Is England
StoryLine: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

Title: It's a Wonderful Life
StoryLine: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Title: Children of Men
StoryLine: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

Title: In the Name of the Father
StoryLine: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

Title: American History X
StoryLine: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

Title: Twelve Monkeys
StoryLine: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Title: Dog Day Afternoon
StoryLine: Three amateur robbers plan to hold up a Brooklyn bank. A nice, simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

Title: The Untouchables
StoryLine: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

Title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
StoryLine: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
StoryLine: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Glengarry Glen Ross
StoryLine: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
StoryLine: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Title: Road to Perdition
StoryLine: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Title: Up
StoryLine: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Title: Natural Born Killers
StoryLine: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

Title: Out of Sight
StoryLine: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

Title: The Bourne Identity
StoryLine: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Title: An American Werewolf in London
StoryLine: American college students David Kessler and Jack Goodman on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists. Jack dies. David recovers in a hospital, where he has nightmares.

Title: United 93
StoryLine: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Title: Full Metal Jacket
StoryLine: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Title: The General
StoryLine: The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.

Title: The Deer Hunter
StoryLine: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Title: Desperado
StoryLine: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
StoryLine: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

Title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
StoryLine: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

Title: Little Miss Sunshine
StoryLine: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Title: Carlito's Way
StoryLine: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

Title: Casino Royale
StoryLine: After earning a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, in Montenegro.

Title: Dirty Harry
StoryLine: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

Title: Gremlins
StoryLine: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

Title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
StoryLine: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels..

Title: Ocean's Eleven
StoryLine: Danny Ocean, a gangster, rounds up a gang of associates to stage a sophisticated and elaborate casino heist which involves robbing three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously during a popular boxing event.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
StoryLine: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: Amores perros
StoryLine: An amateur dog fighter, a supermodel, and a derelict assassin, all separately struggling to find love, find their lives transformed by a devastating car wreck in Mexico City.

Title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
StoryLine: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world.

Title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
StoryLine: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Title: Batman Returns
StoryLine: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

Title: The Virgin Suicides
StoryLine: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

Title: 28 Days Later
StoryLine: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the United Kingdom, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

Title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
StoryLine: With a plan to exact revenge on a legendary shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
StoryLine: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Title: The Italian Job
StoryLine: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

Title: Get Carter
StoryLine: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

Title: The Rules of Attraction
StoryLine: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

Title: Zodiac
StoryLine: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

Title: Hot Fuzz
StoryLine: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

Title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
StoryLine: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Title: Braindead
StoryLine: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

Title: Dumb and Dumber
StoryLine: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Title: The Jungle Book
StoryLine: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

Title: The Bourne Ultimatum
StoryLine: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

Title: Shallow Grave
StoryLine: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

Title: From Dusk Till Dawn
StoryLine: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Title: Gone with the Wind
StoryLine: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
Director: Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood

Title: American Pie
StoryLine: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

Title: Slumdog Millionaire
StoryLine: A teenager from the slums of Mumbai becomes a contestant on the show 'Kaun Banega Crorepati?' When interrogated under suspicion of cheating, he revisits his past, revealing how he had all the answers.

Title: On the Waterfront
StoryLine: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

Title: Snatch
StoryLine: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
StoryLine: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

Title: National Lampoon's Animal House
StoryLine: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

Title: Three Kings
StoryLine: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

Title: In Bruges
StoryLine: After a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

Title: Toy Story 3
StoryLine: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Title: Cloverfield
StoryLine: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

Title: Dawn of the Dead
StoryLine: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: Quiz Show
StoryLine: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Title: A Bittersweet Life
StoryLine: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't follow his boss's orders.

Title: The Sixth Sense
StoryLine: A child psychologist starts treating a young boy with a disturbing secret.

Title: The Long Good Friday
StoryLine: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

Title: Juno
StoryLine: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes a selfless decision regarding the unborn child.

Title: Planet of the Apes
StoryLine: After being kept in hypersleep during a long expedition into deep space, an astronaut crew crash-lands in the 40th century on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.

Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
StoryLine: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Title: Jackie Brown
StoryLine: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the ATF for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the illegal arms dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

Title: Sideways
StoryLine: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

Title: Edward Scissorhands
StoryLine: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

Title: The Thin Red Line
StoryLine: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

Title: Hotel Rwanda
StoryLine: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

Title: Sexy Beast
StoryLine: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

Title: Swingers
StoryLine: A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.

Title: Amélie
StoryLine: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, young waitress Amelie decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey during which she finds true love.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
StoryLine: Influential industrialist Vanger's niece Harriet disappeared under mysterious circumstances 40 years ago. As a last attempt at solving the case, he hires investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.

Title: Cinema Paradiso
StoryLine: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

Title: Witness for the Prosecution
StoryLine: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Title: The Apartment
StoryLine: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

Title: Meet the Parents
StoryLine: Chicago male nurse and chronic under-achiever Greg Focker meets his charming teacher girlfriend Pam Byrnes' parents Jack and Dina before proposing, but suspicious Jack is an overprotective former CIA agent - every date's worst nightmare.

Title: The Right Stuff
StoryLine: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

Title: Catch Me If You Can
StoryLine: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

Title: Saturday Night Fever
StoryLine: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

Title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
StoryLine: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

Title: Happiness
StoryLine: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts which society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

Title: Knocked Up
StoryLine: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

Title: District 9
StoryLine: In a future Earth in which aliens are isolated in a remote ghetto, a government agent finds himself banished there.

Title: Fahrenheit 9/11
StoryLine: Michael Moore's view on what happened to the United States after 9/11 and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Title: Star Trek
StoryLine: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

Title: Senna
StoryLine: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.

Title: The Raid
StoryLine: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

Title: Brick
StoryLine: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

Title: The Lives of Others
StoryLine: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Title: When We Were Kings
StoryLine: Boxing documentary on the 1974 world heavyweight championship bout between defending champion, George Foreman, and the underdog challenger, Muhammad Ali.

Title: Groundhog Day
StoryLine: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

Title: All the President's Men
StoryLine: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

Title: A Quiet Place
StoryLine: A family struggles for survival in a world invaded by blind alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Title: Unbreakable
StoryLine: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

Title: Pan's Labyrinth
StoryLine: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

Title: Hugo
StoryLine: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

Title: Sunshine
StoryLine: A team of international astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

Title: The King of Kong
StoryLine: Die-hard gamers compete to break world records on classic arcade games.

Title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
StoryLine: The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.

Title: Superbad
StoryLine: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Title: Serenity
StoryLine: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
StoryLine: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

Title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
StoryLine: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

Title: 28 Weeks Later
StoryLine: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

Title: The Thin Blue Line
StoryLine: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

Title: Dog Soldiers
StoryLine: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scottish wilderness.

Title: Dead Poets Society
StoryLine: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

Title: Get Shorty
StoryLine: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

Title: Bad Santa
StoryLine: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

Title: Ghostbusters
StoryLine: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

Title: Donnie Brasco
StoryLine: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

Title: Top Gun
StoryLine: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills. When hotshot fighter pilot Maverick is sent to the school, his reckless attitude and cocky demeanor put him at odds with the other pilots, especially the cool and col...

Title: 500 Days of Summer
StoryLine: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Title: Chopper
StoryLine: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

Title: The Breakfast Club
StoryLine: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Title: Grosse Pointe Blank
StoryLine: Professional assassin Martin Blank is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe--where, by coincidence, his 10-year high-school reunion party is about to take place.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
StoryLine: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

Title: The Dirty Dozen
StoryLine: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
StoryLine: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

Title: Harold and Maude
StoryLine: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

Title: Waltz with Bashir
StoryLine: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

Title: Shame
StoryLine: A nymphomaniac's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
StoryLine: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
StoryLine: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Title: Bottle Rocket
StoryLine: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
StoryLine: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda. At the same time, Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

Title: Jackass: The Movie
StoryLine: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

Title: Point Break
StoryLine: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

Title: The Squid and the Whale
StoryLine: Follows two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

Title: Network
StoryLine: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about mass media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

Title: The Irishman
StoryLine: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

Title: Once Upon a Time in the West
StoryLine: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: RoboCop
StoryLine: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

Title: Bonnie and Clyde
StoryLine: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

Title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
StoryLine: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

Title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
StoryLine: Five friends head out to rural Texas to visit the grave of a grandfather. On the way they stumble across what appears to be a deserted house, only to discover something sinister within. Something armed with a chainsaw.

Title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
StoryLine: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

Title: The Skin I Live In
StoryLine: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

Title: Ruby Sparks
StoryLine: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

Title: Layer Cake
StoryLine: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

Title: Rounders
StoryLine: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing high stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

Title: Superman
StoryLine: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

Title: Day of the Dead
StoryLine: As the world is overrun by zombies, a group of scientists and military personnel sheltering in an underground bunker in Florida must decide on how they should deal with the undead horde.

Title: Marathon Man
StoryLine: After the murder of his older brother, a New York history student is hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.

Title: Midnight Cowboy
StoryLine: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Title: Life of Brian
StoryLine: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

Title: Raising Arizona
StoryLine: When a childless couple--an ex-con and an ex-cop--decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

Title: Moon
StoryLine: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

Title: Clerks
StoryLine: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

Title: Drag Me to Hell
StoryLine: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

Title: Brazil
StoryLine: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Title: The Bourne Supremacy
StoryLine: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

Title: Three Colours: Red
StoryLine: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

Title: A History of Violence
StoryLine: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

Title: The Hangover
StoryLine: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must make their way around the city in order to find their friend in time for his wedding.

Title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
StoryLine: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

Title: The Producers
StoryLine: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

Title: Animal Kingdom
StoryLine: A seventeen-year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

Title: The Hudsucker Proxy
StoryLine: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

Title: Jerry Maguire
StoryLine: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

Title: Speed
StoryLine: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

Title: True Grit
StoryLine: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

Title: Cool Hand Luke
StoryLine: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

Title: Zombieland
StoryLine: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

Title: American: The Bill Hicks Story
StoryLine: Photo-animated feature documentary, uniquely narrated by the 10 people who knew Bill best.

Title: Crash
StoryLine: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

Title: The Graduate
StoryLine: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Title: A Bronx Tale
StoryLine: An intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

Title: Let the Right One In
StoryLine: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Title: As Good as It Gets
StoryLine: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

Title: Das Boot
StoryLine: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

Title: A Serious Man
StoryLine: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Despite seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

Title: The Fly
StoryLine: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Title: The Wrestler
StoryLine: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Title: Titanic
StoryLine: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: Finding Nemo
StoryLine: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Title: The Fugitive
StoryLine: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
StoryLine: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: The Hustler
StoryLine: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Title: A Fistful of Dollars
StoryLine: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Title: Don't Look Now
StoryLine: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

Title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
StoryLine: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

Title: The Mist
StoryLine: A thick fog descends upon a rural community, killing anyone caught outside, survivors seek refuge in a local store. Trapped in a darkened cloud of pure horror, the frightened denizens of the town must fend off murderous monster waves.

Title: Field of Dreams
StoryLine: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

Title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
StoryLine: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

Title: Moneyball
StoryLine: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

Title: Jackass Number Two
StoryLine: Chris Pontius, Johnny Knoxville, Steve-O, Bam Margera, and the whole crew return to the screen to raise the stakes higher than ever before.

Title: The Fighter
StoryLine: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

Title: Mud
StoryLine: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

Title: Headhunters
StoryLine: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

Title: This Is the End
StoryLine: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

Title: Gone Girl
StoryLine: The husband of a missing woman becomes the chief suspect in her disappearance.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
StoryLine: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: The Raid 2
StoryLine: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
StoryLine: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

Title: The Descent
StoryLine: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

Title: Patriots Day
StoryLine: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
StoryLine: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

Title: Insomnia
StoryLine: Will Dormer, a police detective, is sent to investigate a teenage girl's murder to a small fishing town where he accidentally shoots his co-detective and is afflicted by insomnia brought by the guilt.

Title: Capturing the Friedmans
StoryLine: Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middle-class Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.

Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
StoryLine: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

Title: Batman
StoryLine: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Title: Sleepy Hollow
StoryLine: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

Title: The Third Man
StoryLine: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

Title: Spider-Man 2
StoryLine: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a former brilliant scientist named Otto Octavius.

Title: 24 Hour Party People
StoryLine: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

Title: The Blair Witch Project
StoryLine: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

Title: End of Watch
StoryLine: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

Title: WALL·E
StoryLine: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

Title: The Imposter
StoryLine: A documentary centered on a young man in Spain who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

Title: Salvador
StoryLine: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

Title: X-Men 2
StoryLine: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

Title: Spider-Man
StoryLine: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

Title: North by Northwest
StoryLine: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

Title: Inside Man
StoryLine: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Title: Face/Off
StoryLine: To foil a terrorist plot, FBI agent Sean Archer assumes the identity of the criminal Castor Troy who murdered his son through facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

Title: The Lego Movie
StoryLine: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

Title: Battle Royale
StoryLine: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill one another under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
StoryLine: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

Title: Mission: Impossible
StoryLine: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Title: Collateral
StoryLine: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

Title: Edge of Tomorrow
StoryLine: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

Title: Snowpiercer
StoryLine: In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges.

Title: Blade
StoryLine: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

Title: The Artist
StoryLine: When George, a silent movie superstar, meets Peppy Miller, a dancer, sparks fly between the two. However, after the introduction of talking pictures, their fortunes change, affecting their dynamic.

Title: The Crying Game
StoryLine: A British soldier kidnapped by the IRA soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

Title: Grizzly Man
StoryLine: A devastating and heart-rending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzly bears in Alaska.

Title: Starship Troopers
StoryLine: Humans, in a fascist militaristic future, wage war with giant alien bugs.

Title: Dig!
StoryLine: A documentary on the once-promising American rock bands The Brian Jonestown Massacre and The Dandy Warhols, and the friendship/rivalry between their respective founders, Anton Newcombe and Courtney Taylor.

Title: Hidden (Caché)
StoryLine: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

Title: Come and See
StoryLine: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Title: 13 Assassins
StoryLine: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: Gone Baby Gone
StoryLine: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

Title: Rango
StoryLine: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Title: Three Colors: White
StoryLine: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Title: Murderball
StoryLine: Quadriplegics, who play full-contact rugby in wheelchairs, overcome unimaginable obstacles to compete in the Paralympic Games in Athens, Greece.
Director: Henry Alex Rubin, Dana Adam Shapiro

Title: Dogville
StoryLine: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

Title: Blow Out
StoryLine: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Title: Marley
StoryLine: A documentary on the life, music, and legacy of Bob Marley.

Title: American Splendor
StoryLine: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.

Title: Changeling
StoryLine: After Christine's son goes missing, she reaches out to the LAPD to find him, but when they try to pass off an impostor as her son to quiet public protests, she refuses to accept him or give up hope.

Title: Braveheart
StoryLine: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: The Fisher King
StoryLine: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

Title: Wild at Heart
StoryLine: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

Title: Control
StoryLine: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to die by suicide at the age of 23.

Title: In the Loop
StoryLine: A political satire about a group of skeptical American and British operatives attempting to prevent a war between two countries.

Title: Cop Land
StoryLine: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

Title: Oldboy
StoryLine: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

Title: Black Swan
StoryLine: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.

Title: Memories of Murder
StoryLine: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
StoryLine: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: Argo
StoryLine: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
StoryLine: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

Title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
StoryLine: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

Title: Notting Hill
StoryLine: A set of circumstances makes Anna Scott, a famous actress, fall in love with William Thacker, owner of a bookstore in Notting Hill. But the paparazzi's fascination with her complicates their bond.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
StoryLine: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Title: The Proposition
StoryLine: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

Title: Bernie
StoryLine: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp.

Title: The Aviator
StoryLine: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

Title: Knuckle
StoryLine: An epic 12-year journey into the brutal and secretive world of Irish Traveler bare-knuckle fighting. This film follows a history of violent feuding between rival clans.

Title: Paths of Glory
StoryLine: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

Title: A Hard Day's Night
StoryLine: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

Title: Holy Motors
StoryLine: A man boards a limousine to be driven to his day's work: nine mysterious "appointments."

Title: Moonrise Kingdom
StoryLine: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

Title: Capitalism: A Love Story
StoryLine: An examination of the social costs of corporate interests pursuing profits at the expense of the public good.

Title: Galaxy Quest
StoryLine: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

Title: A Room for Romeo Brass
StoryLine: After stopping 12 y.o. Romeo and Gavin from being beaten up, Morell drives them home and meets Romeo's adult sister and falls in love. The boys "help" him in his pursuit.

Title: Big
StoryLine: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

Title: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
StoryLine: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.

Title: Performance
StoryLine: A violent East London gangster undergoes a transformation of identity while hiding from his former colleagues in the home of a jaded Bohemian rock star and his two girlfriends.

Title: Michael Clayton
StoryLine: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

Title: The Fifth Element
StoryLine: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

Title: Shaun of the Dead
StoryLine: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Title: The Spy Who Loved Me
StoryLine: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

Title: A Monster Calls
StoryLine: Conor, a twelve-year-old boy, encounters an ancient tree monster who proceeds to help him cope with his mother's terminal illness and being bullied in school.

Title: I, Tonya
StoryLine: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

Title: The Secret in Their Eyes
StoryLine: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

Title: Broadcast News
StoryLine: Two television network reporters - one smart but insecure, the other less knowledgeable but more telegenic - compete for the friendship, respect and romantic interest of a hard-driven, neurotic female producer.

Title: The Goonies
StoryLine: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

Title: Rebel Without a Cause
StoryLine: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
